name: Turtles Have Short Legs
description:
Space to confirm, arrow keys to move.

This game was made in under ten minutes during the quarantine of the Great Coronavirus Pandemic of 2020 out of isolation madness.

Please actually buy Can recordings or at least listen to their official releases if you like their music - you'll get superior quality and support the actual creators (or at least the legal owners). I do not own the music in-game, and I am not affiliated with Can, any of the members of Can, or whoever happens to own their music right now.
